snippet: "True Blood," HBO's hit supernatural series, will return for a fifth season on June 10, followed on June 24 by "The Newsroom," a new series created by Aaron Sorkin.
abstract: "True Blood," HBO's hit supernatural series, will return for a fifth season on June 10, followed on June 24 by "The Newsroom," a new series created by Aaron Sorkin.

headline.main: HBO Sets Debut Dates for 'The Newsroom' and 'True Blood'
